data.text: Happy Birthday Mom! You are best, and I am blessed to have you as my mother.May you enjoy your special day.
Happy Birthday to the most lovable mother in the world. May God let your life filled with boundless joy
Happy birthday to my amazing mother. You are the best and I love you so much
Heartfelt wishes from the bottom of my heart to the most beautiful woman in the entire universe. Enjoy your special day
You are not the angel who only appears when I need, you are the angel that never leaves my side.Happy birthday to my amazing mom!
Mom, your love and laughter fills my heart with a million moments of joy. You are best Mom in the world.Happy birthday
Happy birthday to the most wholesome woman I know of. Your daughter loves you because you are beautiful, both from the inside and the outside.
Take my warm wishes and love from the deepest pith of my heart. Have a nice happy birthday mom
Every year I wait for this day. You are so special to me that your presence in my life is bigger than everything else. Happy birthday, mother
I hope you have a great day and a wonderful year ahead. Happy Birthday Dear Mother
Today is the day to celebrate someone so important in my life. Someone who taught me the importance of faith and family. Happy birthday dear mom
Growing up was awesome because of you. Thank you for giving me such a wonderful childhood. Happy birthday
My life would not be complete without you by my side. You have been with me through all the good and the bad times. Happy Birthday Mother
No matter how old you become, you will always be the same beautiful amazing lady in my eyes. Happy birthday Beautiful
I have the adorable mother in the world and can not thank her enough for making me what I am today! All the best wishes for you for today and ever.
You are not only my mother, my philosopher, guider and best friend. Thanks for everything and wish you a great happy birthday!
Whenever I needed you, you were always there by my side, holding my hand tightly and supporting me! It is amazingly a blessing to have you as my Mom
God cannot be everywhere, thats why He has sent you in my life to show me right or wrong and protect me. It is a blessing to me
Thank you mum for always being on the lookout for your daughter. Warm wishes and prayers for your birthday!
Happy birthday, Mom! I want you to know that I am nothing without you but I can be everything with you by my side. Love you
I wish you a wonderful year and a very happy birthday. Love you Mom.
Your presence in my life is the biggest blessing of my life. I am who I am only because of your unconditional love and sacrifice. Happy birthday mom
I wish you a very warm and happy birthday. May God pour all the love and warmth on you.
A goddess might be fair, but you are fairer. Happy birthday to my dearest mom
Mum, youâ€™ve been such an inspiration in my life. Your inner beauty, courage, and resilience never cease to amaze me  Have the happiest of birthdays
